Sentencas: In the context of green and low-carbon production, efficient co-generation systems have received more attention.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Many production and life scenarios exhibit the need of constant temperature and low humidity environment.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, an efficient SOFC-based combined cooling, heating, and power (CCHP) system with humidity control has been established for a plant.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The innovation is that the cascade absorption refrigeration dehumidification (CARD) subsystem is driven by the waste heat of SOFC to controlling air temperature and humidity effectively.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Comprehensive modeling and thermodynamic analysis are carried out.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results reveal that the SOFC stack should be operated in the ohmic loss region.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When the recycle ratio is greater than 0.85, the output and efficiency will reduce.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The temperature of the liquid desiccant has a large effect on the CARD subsystem.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: There is a limit to the efficiency gain caused by the increase in the mass flow rate of liquid desiccant.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For the system, the energy efficiency reaches 68.3%, the exergy efficiency is 56.3%, and the payback time is less than the life cycle, indicating that the system has better efficiency and economic benefits.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This work provides an efficient and costsaving design solution for practical applications of novel cogeneration systems.
Titulo: Proposal and analysis of a combined cooling, heating, and power system with humidity control based on solid oxide fuel cell
